zimbra_account_tooltip_need_slot: No account available, please order one.
zimbra_account_cancel_modal_content: The {{ email }} email and all of its data will be permanently erased when the subscription ends.
zimbra_slot_cancel_modal_content: Your service will be deleted at the end of your commitment period.
zimbra_slot_cancel_modal_confirm: Do you wish to cancel your service?
zimbra_slot_undo_cancel_modal_content: With auto-renewal enabled, your service will continue uninterrupted beyond your subscription’s end date.
zimbra_slot_undo_cancel_modal_confirm: Do you want to re-enable auto-renewal for your service?
zimbra_account_delete_modal_content_step: Are you sure you want to delete the email account {{ email }}?
Are you sure you want to delete the email account {{ email }}?
zimbra_account_delete_modal_warn_message: Warning: this action is irreversible and will erase the data.
zimbra_account_upgrade_new_offer: We’re launching our <Link href="{{ zimbra_emails_link }}">new Zimbra Pro solution</Link>.
zimbra_account_upgrade_offer_details: Account upgrades are free throughout the beta phase.
zimbra_account_upgrade_lab_page: For more information, please read <Link href="{{ zimbra_beta_link }}">the beta conditions on the OVHcloud Labs page</Link>.
zimbra_account_upgrade_success_message: Your upgrade request has been processed. It will be processed in a few moments.
zimbra_account_upgrade_error_message: Unable to submit your upgrade request. {{ error }}
zimbra_account_downgrade_success_message: Your request to downgrade has been processed. It will be processed in a few moments.
zimbra_account_downgrade_error_message: Your downgrade request could not be completed. {{ error }}
zimbra_account_downgrade_storage_exceede: The mailbox has reached the storage limit set by the target solution. Please clean your mailbox.
zimbra_account_downgrade_drive_not_empty: It looks like there are files in your drive. Please delete all the files in the folder and recycle bin to switch solutions.
zimbra_account_plan_feature_share_starte: Manual sharing (no ActiveSync). For Android, sharing only works with Zimbra.
zimbra_account_plan_feature_sync_tooltip: Automatic real-time syncing on all devices.
zimbra_account_update_offer_paid_now_too: The price is calculated pro rata, based on the time left until your next renewal date.
